data.title: Heliotropium curassavicum
data.text:
Continental: Northern America

Alabama, Colorado, Florida, Mexican Pacific Is., Mexico Central, Mexico Gulf, Mexico Northeast, Mexico Northwest, Mexico Southeast, Mexico Southwest, New Mexico, Texas

Continental: Southern America

Argentina Northeast, Argentina Northwest, Argentina South, Aruba, Bahamas, Belize, Bermuda, Bolivia, Brazil Northeast, Brazil Southeast, Central American Pac, Chile Central, Chile North, Colombia, Cuba, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Galápagos, Guatemala, Guyana, Haiti, Honduras, Leeward Is., Netherlands Antilles, Nicaragua, Panamá, Paraguay, Peru, Puerto Rico, Southwest Caribbean, Suriname, Turks-Caicos Is., Venezuela, Venezuelan Antilles, Windward Is.

Introduced into:

Algeria, Angola, Azores, Baleares, Bangladesh, Botswana, Canary Is., Cape Provinces, Cape Verde, Cyprus, East Aegean Is., Egypt, France, Free State, Greece, Gulf States, Illinois, KwaZulu-Natal, Libya, Morocco, Mozambique, Namibia, Northern Provinces, Pakistan, Palestine, Portugal, Romania, Sardegna, Saudi Arabia, Sicilia, Spain, Sri Lanka, Tanzania, Tunisia, Turkey, West Himalaya

References: 2001. TDWG – World Geographical Scheme for Recording Plant Distributions, 2nd Edition

For more multimedia, look at Heliotropium curassavicum on Wikimedia Commons.
